channel.title: Blades in the Dark
channel.description: Recent content on Blades in the Dark

item.title: at Kellen's
item.description: Abstract The professionals meet Lyndra, their deal broker in Kellen’s bar and agree to kidnap Errin’s nephew, the son of Tarvul, the rightful head of the Billhooks gang, but who’s currently imprisoned.

item.title: Coran's kidnapping
item.description: Abstract After the gang meets Coran while trying to racketeer the owner of the Mandragoras bar, they kidnap him and transport him to an empty building in the docks. Entanglements: Usual suspects - Bryl, the owner of Mandragoras.

item.title: Captain Hurricane
item.description: Abstract While meeting Lyndra in Kellen’s bar, Lyndra suggests to the professionals that it’d be a good idea to get in contact with captain Hurricane, a leviathan hunter that’s currently in town.

item.title: Impromptu show
item.description: Abstract The professionals use their social skills to set up an impromptu street show and get captain Hurricane’s attention. Gabriella is surprised by the fact that among the captain’s crew is her brother, who reveals her true name. Entanglements: Usual suspects - Darmond, a bluecoat.

item.title: preparing for the main show
item.description: Abstract The gang meets and gets all the needed resources together - people for the show, meeting with Lyndra and get to know the location of the party that captain Hurricane will have the party.

item.title: the greatest show
item.description: Abstract Despite being initially identified by Coran before his execution, the professionals put on a great show and manage to gain captain Hurricane’s favor. Entanglements: Demonic Notice.
